sense.name: examine carefully
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1[agent] INSPECT NP2[patient] (PP{for NP})
sense.examples: Danvers Fire Department records show it last inspected the plant in 2002. Please inspect your father's will carefully. This program usually inspects the environment and asks the user to select various options. No bomb squad members wore any protective masks or clothing while inspecting the package. We have inspected this vehicle and serviced prior to offering for sale.
